injury.name: Delerium
injury.description: * While you have Delerium, you are `Dull`. * You can not use "Clever" skills. * If you were already Dull: now, you cannot use any skills at all. * This overrides any character traits you might already have (if you were Clever, now you are Dull). * After two nights of rest, downgrade this to Massive, Painful Scar.
